title: ~ 1 month free - Luxury efficient studio in the heart of Downtown
posting_body: Listed price is factoring in the special of 1-month over a 12-month lease term.
🏠 This is a functional studio in the heart of downtown.
Walkable to Rainey, East Austin, Lady Bird lake, Whole foods.
~ This is a great studio layout with no real wasted space.
New finishes keep the space airy and light.
This is ideal for those looking to minimize on their furniture and walk/bike to work.
If you work downtown you will not need a car.
This community is in the heart of downtown Austin.
You are just a few mins away from Whole Foods and East Austin.
😄 I'm a licensed Apartment locator and get paid by the properties so my service is 100% free.
I have been doing this job for over 5 years.
I love what I do and my goal is to make your apartment search as easy and smooth as possible.
Don't hesitate to text or call me and use my knowledge of Austin's market to assure you get a great deal on your next apartment.
